text: William Morey (December 19, 1919 - December 10, 2003) was an American actor. He was known for his roles in Death Race 2000 (1975), Brainstorm (1983), and Real Men (1987). He was also a television actor appearing on small roles in Full House, Fraiser, Boy Meets World, and in Beggars and Choosers. Morey died in Santa Monica, California from natural causes, aged 83. ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:2003 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts
title: Bill Morey
